messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

new client and project codes needed oracle re client codes needed hi please find attached files needed added details each minor changes please let needed thanks november pm client codes needed hi each separate form needed kindly ask provide details thank kind regards analyst ext hub november client codes needed hi please help create client codes client name salad codes needed salad code code code each mentioned codes attached form client creation please let please let more details needed thanks
